sentences.cn: 艾丽斯有一串绿宝石项链.

sentences.en: An emerald of that size, unflawed, would be worth a king's ransom.
sentences.cn: 一块那么大 、 而又无瑕疵的绿宝石会是价值连城的.

sentences.en: And I grow dumb, dazzled by the emerald essence of the leaves.
sentences.cn: 树叶翠绿的精华, 使我变得喑哑,晕眩.

sentences.en: As far as colors go, this year we will be seeing some brights like orange, yellow, fuchsia, apple green, emerald, and amethyst.
sentences.cn: 至于颜色的流行趋势，今年我们将会看到一些明亮的颜色如橘色、黄色、桃红色、苹果绿、翠绿色和紫色。

sentences.en: Emerald starlings are fairly small when compared with other such birds.
sentences.cn: 与同类的其他鸟相比，翠辉椋鸟要小很多。

sentences.en: Free running emerald laser pumped by 660 nm laser diode ( LD ) was reported.
sentences.cn: 报道了温差水热法生长的祖母绿晶体在660nm激光二极管 ( LD ) 抽运下的激光实验结果.

sentences.en: Green changed to white, emerald to an opal: nothing was changed.
sentences.cn: 绿色倒入杯中,褪为乳白.翡翠抛离光芒, 化为猫眼: 一切如故.

sentences.en: Her jaw line tightened to squareness and her eyes went emerald.
sentences.cn: 她的下颚紧得成了方形,她的眼睛变成翡翠的颜色.

sentences.en: In terms of colour, black, red and jewel tones like sapphire blue and emerald GREen are in, while pumpkins and yellows are out, Ms Stanger said.
sentences.cn: 至于衣服的颜色，斯坦格说，黑色、红色以及宝蓝、祖母绿这样的宝石色调比较时髦，而南瓜色和黄色则显得老土。

sentences.en: She is wearing a ring set with emerald.
sentences.cn: 她戴着一枚嵌有绿宝石的戒指.

sentences.en: She told the artist, Paint me with diamond earrings, a diamond necklace, emerald bracelets and a ruby pendant.
sentences.cn: 她告诉那位肖像画家说：“画我带着钻石耳环、钻石项链、祖母绿手镯，还有红宝石垂饰。”

sentences.en: That emerald curtain doesn't match the floor.
sentences.cn: 那翠绿色的窗帘和地板很不相配。

sentences.en: The emerald, the ruby, and the topaz gleam upon its dress.
sentences.cn: 那翠绿的 、 艳红的 、 嫩黄色的羽毛闪闪发光.

sentences.en: The lily of the valley in winter draw on emerald green breath.
sentences.cn: 冬天的铃兰,吸引着翠绿的呼吸.

sentences.en: The slender tree is dressed in emerald all about.
The Xunliao Bay is billed as the blue emerald.
sentences.cn: 巽寮湾被称为“蓝色翡翠”.

sentences.en: These lines of emerald bamboos have become a playground for pandas.
sentences.cn: 这几排翠竹成了大熊猫的乐园.

sentences.en: Vigorous young red elm trees thrust emerald - green crowns through a canopy of waist - high weeds.
sentences.cn: 生机盎然的小红榆树从齐腰高的杂草从中探出翠绿的花冠.

words.tran_cn: 绿宝石，翡翠；[宝]祖母绿；翠绿色

trans.tran_cn: 祖母绿，绿宝石，翡翠，翠绿色，[印]一种活字
trans.tran_en: a valuable bright green stone that is often used in jewellery
